articles.description: The inaugural Champions League league phase is set for an exciting final day with 25 of the 36 teams still awaiting their fate.
articles.title: Champions League table: Points, permutations, who has qualified & how the knockouts work

articles.description: Arsenal defender Myles Lewis-Skelly's three-match ban - imposed for his red card at Wolves on Saturday - has been overturned after an appeal.
articles.title: Arsenal: Myles Lewis-Skelly ban overturned after red card at Wolves

articles.description: Rory McIlroy believes that golf fans could become "fatigued" by the wealth of options available to them and suggests there are "definitely too many" events on the current PGA Tour schedule.
articles.title: Pebble Beach Pro-Am: 'Diminished' PGA Tour could scale back number of events says Rory McIlroy

articles.description: England produce a strong bowling performance to beat India by 26 runs in the third T20 in Rajkot.
articles.title: India vs England: Tourists win third T20 by 26 runs to keep series alive

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola describes his side's Champions League situation as 'not a problem' but  'an opportunity' as they look to avoid exiting at the group stage.
articles.title: Champions League: Man City manager Pep Guardiola on 'opportunity' against Club Brugge

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is continuing his preparations for the Formula 1 season by testing for his new Ferrari team at the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya this week.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton: Ferrari driver continues F1 testing in Barcelona

articles.description: Twins Tom and Ben Curry will play together for England for the first time as they are picked in the back row to face Ireland on Saturday.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England pick Curry twins to face Ireland

articles.description: BBC cricket reporter Henry Moeran explores the possible reasons why the gap in quality between Australia and England is so significant in women's cricket.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Why is the gap between Australia and England so significant?

articles.description: Mercedes driver Andrea Kimi Antonelli passes his driving test six weeks before he makes his Formula 1 debut at the season-opening Australian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Andrea Kimi Antonelli: Mercedes driver passes driving test

articles.description: A spectator at a high school indoor track meeting is killed after being accidently hit by a hammer thrown by an athlete.
articles.title: Hammer throw death: Athletics spectator killed at Colorado high school meeting
